error-without-status: An error occurred on the server
title: Saamb | Wedding
welcome-title: Welcome to Sarah & Ambroise's Wedding App
login-instructions: You will find your group name and access code in your invitation. These access combinations are common to all members of your group.
login-issue: If you encounter a problem, please contact Ambroise.
login-title: Please login using your group name and access code
logout-question-confirmation: Are you sure you want to logout?
leave-blank: Leave blank if you don't have any
song-request-placeholder: Let our DJ know what you want to hear
wish-list-explaination: We have been living together for some time and already have a collection of Tupperware and other barbecue accessories. That's why we propose that you participate, if you wish, in our 2-month trip in spring 2024 (to destinations not yet defined due to wedding planning). We invite you to discover the list of our must-haves for our honeymoon!
camp-on-site: Will you be camping on site?
brunch-next-day: Will you attend the brunch on Sunday?
wl-coffee-croissant: A coffee and croissant at Zurich airport
wl-tomato-juice: A tomato juice on the plane
wl-postcard: A postcard signed by the newlyweds
wl-fastfood: A fast food at the airport
wl-champagne: A bottle of champagne for the first night
wl-coffee-croissant-description: To put Sarah in a good mood in the morning
wl-tomato-juice-description: What would a flight be without tomato juice?
wl-biafin-description: For when Ambroise forgets the sunscreen
wl-sunscreen-description: Because according to Sarah, different protection factors are needed
wl-book-description: A good thriller for the beach and for Sarah to give Ambroise some peace for a while.
wl-internet-description: For GPS... and for Ambroise to give Sarah some peace for a while.
wl-sunglasses-description: One of us is going to forget them... or lose them... Want to bet who?
wl-fastfood-description: Yes, it's greasy... yes, it's not good... but it works...
wl-champagne-description: Even almost a year later, it's still our honeymoon!

details.title: Main Information
details.date: July 1st, 2023. The ceremony will start at 4 p.m.
details.by-train: The house is 3 minutes away from 'Vevey Vigneron' station, the train leaves Vevey Station at 3:11 PM

accommodation.title: Accommodation Options
accommodation.description: We recommend 2 hotels not too far away to walk from the house:
accommodation.camping: For the more adventurous, there will also be the option to camp on-site.

unimplemented.title: Oops! We're Working on it!
unimplemented.message: Looks like we haven't quite finished building this page yet. Please check back soon, we're working hard to get it up and running! In the meantime, enjoy the rest of the site and have a great day!
unimplemented.seat-message: Sarah & Ambroise are currently scratching their heads to figure out the best seating arrangements for everyone. We appreciate your patience and will have it sorted out soon!
unimplemented.quiz-message: Our wedding quiz will be available soon! Come back and test your knowledge of the bride and groom!
unimplemented.pic-collector-message: We know everyone is eagerly waiting for the traditional slideshow, but we have something even better in store for you! Our Pic Collector will allow you to submit and share your own photos of the bride and groom. Keep an eye out for codes throughout the wedding that will give you access to exclusive photos. And if you have any photos you'd like to share with the rest of the guests, feel free to send them to Ambroise!

cash.bank-details-instruction: In order to avoid any commission from an external service, we kindly suggest that you transfer the money directly to our shared bank account. The details are provided below.
cash.copy-to-clipboard-instruction: Click on each row to copy the information to the clipboard.

delete-user-question-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
delete-group-question-confirmation:
Are you sure you want to delete this user?
All associated users will also be deleted:
quiz-intro: Welcome to our quiz designed to test your knowledge about the bride and groom! This quiz consists of 20 questions that are categorized as either easy or hard. Easy questions are worth 3 points while hard questions are worth 5 points. You have the flexibility to pause the quiz and leave the page at any time, and when you return, you can continue where you left off. However, please note that you only have one attempt at the quiz, so make sure to answer each question carefully. Good luck!
name: Name

question-1.text: Which of the following has Ambroise never eaten?

question-2.text: Which of these names is not the name of one of our plants?

question-4.text: Which of these options is not a childhood pet?

question-5.text: Which of the following is not one of our nicknames (thanks, parents)?

question-7.text: What did Sarah say when Ambroise asked her to marry him?
question-7.option-a: Ok, but you're doing the taxes

question-8.text: Which country have Sarah & Ambroise not visited together?

question-9.text: What is the age difference between Ambroise and Sarah?

question-10.text: What was their first shared purchase after moving in together?

question-11.text: How many brothers does Ambroise have?

question-12.text: Which association was Sarah a member of?

question-13.text: What was the first dish that Ambroise cooked for Sarah?

question-14.text: What was the first dish that Sarah cooked for Ambroise?

question-15.option-a: Ambroise passed his high school diploma
question-15.option-b: Ambroise and Sarah worked at the Montreux Jazz Festival
question-15.option-c: Sarah moved in on her own
question-15.option-d: Ambroise and Sarah met each other

question-16.text: What was the first Christmas gift that Ambroise gave to Eric (Sarah's father)?
question-16.option-b: A large-print book for the visually impaired
question-16.option-c: A special cushion for people with back pain
question-16.option-d: An alarm to find his keys

question-17.text: Which of the following is not a pair of socks that Ambroise owns?

question-18.text: Where did Sarah and Ambroise meet?

question-19.text: Which sport has Sarah never practiced?

question-20.text: Where did Sarah go for her Erasmus?
